name: Touken Ranbu Warriors - Additional Music 5-piece Set
detailed_description:
Arrangements of pieces from the source material "Touken Ranbu ONLINE".
A set that allows you to obtain at a discount all 5 additional music pieces.

Content:
- Additional Music "Battle - Touken Ranbu Warriors"
- Additional Music "Memories of Aonohara - Touken Ranbu Warriors"
- Additional Music "Osaka Winter Campaign - Touken Ranbu Warriors"
- Additional Music "Honmaru - Touken Ranbu Warriors"
- Additional Music "Uchiban - Touken Ranbu Warriors"

How to use:
Battle Music: Can be changed by selecting "Replay" from Honmaru, and then selecting "Change Battle Music" from Battle Preparations.
Honmaru Music: Can be changed by selecting "Settings" - "Change Honmaru Music" from Honmaru.

Notes:
"Change Honmaru Music" can be used after clearing the game.
You can listen to additional music by selecting "Memoirs" - "Music Album" from Honmaru.
There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
To use the content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.

supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
